__e: You've missed the opportunity of knowing your son.
Now I've got to come all the way back out here again and that's more time lost.
There was just... wasted time and then she was gone.
So where is our prodigal daughter?
Let's just say the crouching tigress is about to find her hidden dragon.
Or is it the prodigal daughter?
Lo and behold, the prodigal son returns.
Will you look at the woman? You'd think I was the one who'd been lost.
Like the prodigal son out to find his way in the world?
And then the Prodigal Son... come home to his ma and pa.
You realise Jack did what he did because it was our only way to find the Lost City?
If this is not the Lost City... then where is it?
- He's right. If we destroy it, we lose our only chance to find the location of the Lost City.
I always felt he was a bit of a lost soul.
I told you he was a lost soul and needed saving.
- And it's God's plan. If his reason, if his judgment is to send one more sinner, one more lost soul into the fire, what can I do?
Seems like some lost souls were found.
She found two lost souls and turned us into a family.
